uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions

Class LengthChangedCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.MediaPlayerEventAdapter
      • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.Condition<T>
        • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.DefaultCondition<Long>
          • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.condition.conditions.LengthChangedCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaPlayerEventListener

    public class LengthChangedCondition
extends DefaultCondition<Long>
    Implementation of a condition that waits for the media player to report that the media length has changed.
